org.gatein.api.common

Class Sorting<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gatein.api.common.Sorting<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Sorting<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A sorting object defining order (ASC, DESC) or a custom comparator, but not both.
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sorting

        public Sorting(Sorting.Order order)
        A sorting object with an order, i.e. ascending or descending. T must be comparable.
        Parameters:
        order - the order to sort.
